sqlMap.select: select u2.* from ( select u1.*, rownum as rm from ( select t_id as "roleID", t_name as "roleName", t_desc as "roleDesc" from t_roles r ) u1 where rownum <= #endPos# ) u2 where u2.rm >= #startPos#
select t_id as "roleID", t_name as "roleName", t_desc as "roleDesc" from t_roles where t_id = #roleID#

select m.t_id as "id", m.t_name as "name", m.t_url as "url", m.t_pid as "pid", m.t_type as "type", nvl2(m1.t_role_id, 1, 0) as "checked", m.t_parent as "isParent" from t_menus m left join (select m2.t_role_id, m2.t_menu_id from t_r_m_mid m2 where m2.t_role_id = #roleID#) m1 on m.t_id = m1.t_menu_id order by m.t_id
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_r_m_mid (t_id, t_role_id, t_menu_id) values (t_r_m_mid_seq.nextval, #roleID#, #menuID#)
insert into t_roles (t_id, t_name, t_desc) values (t_roles_seq.nextval, #roleName#, #roleDesc#)
sqlMap.update: update t_roles set t_name=#roleName#, t_desc=#roleDesc# where t_id=#roleID#
